hero.title: MedX Lab
hero.subtitle: Building trustworthy and accessible medical AI, focusing on large language model technologies to empower clinical decision-making and medical research

about.title: About the Lab
about.description1: MedX Lab (医维矩阵实验室) is a laboratory supported by the National Engineering Research Center for Software Engineering (NERC) at Peking University, led by Professor Yasha Wang and managed by Research Assistant Professor Liantao Ma. The lab collaborates extensively with the University of Hong Kong, the University of Edinburgh, and other institutions.
about.description2: Our collaborating hospitals include Peking University Third Hospital, Peking University Cancer Hospital, and others. We focus on large language model technologies to empower clinical decision-making and medical research, creating a complete loop from clinical needs to technology development to practical applications.

areas.ehr: Precision Medicine Prediction Based on EHR
areas.ehrDesc: Building clinically verifiable, highly trustworthy, and interpretable deep learning frameworks
areas.llmDesc: Constructing knowledge bases with both individual clinical EHR data and medical expert experience
areas.platform: LLM-Driven AI for Science Research Platform
areas.platformDesc: Breaking down barriers for medical researchers in AI technology applications

director.name: Liantao Ma
director.title: Lab Director
director.description: Research Assistant Professor at the National Engineering Research Center for Software Engineering, Peking University. Long-term engagement in medical informatics and interpretable deep learning analysis of electronic health record data.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for collaborations and opportunities
contact.recruitment: We are always looking for talented researchers and students to join our team. Check out our open positions and collaboration opportunities.
contact.address: 5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District, Beijing, Peking University

people.title: Our Team
people.centerLabRelation: MedX Lab is affiliated with the National Engineering Research Center for Software Engineering at Peking University. Under the guidance of Professor Yasha Wang, the lab is managed by Assistant Professor Liantao Ma.
people.labDescription: MedX Lab focuses on interdisciplinary research in medical informatics and AI applications in healthcare, cultivating versatile research talent that integrates medicine and engineering.

publications.title: Publications
publications.subtitle: Explore our latest research findings and academic contributions

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed about our latest research breakthroughs, events, and announcements from MedX Lab

1.title: MedX Lab Welcomes New Postdoctoral Researchers
1.summary: We are excited to welcome three new postdoctoral researchers specializing in medical AI and large language models to our team.

2.title: New Publication in Nature Medicine
2.summary: Our research on AI-assisted clinical decision making has been published in Nature Medicine, marking a significant milestone.

3.title: Annual Medical AI Workshop 2024
3.summary: Join us for our annual workshop featuring leading experts in medical AI, discussing the latest developments and challenges.

4.title: Partnership with Peking University Cancer Hospital
4.summary: MedX Lab establishes strategic partnership with Peking University Cancer Hospital for collaborative research on AI in oncology.

5.title: Best Paper Award at ICML 2024
5.summary: Our team received the best paper award at ICML 2024 for our work on interpretable medical AI systems.

6.title: New Lab Facilities Opening
6.summary: MedX Lab expands with new research facilities dedicated to medical AI development and clinical applications.

join.title: Join Us
join.subtitle: Build the future of medical AI with us. We're looking for talented researchers, engineers, and students to join our interdisciplinary team.

research.title: Cutting-edge Research
research.description: Work on groundbreaking medical AI research that directly impacts healthcare and saves lives.

team.title: Expert Team
team.description: Collaborate with leading researchers from Peking University, University of Hong Kong, University of Edinburgh, and top medical institutions.

innovation.title: Innovation Environment
innovation.description: Thrive in a culture that encourages creativity, experimentation, and pushing boundaries.

impact.title: Real-world Impact
impact.description: See your work translate into practical applications that help doctors and patients worldwide.

resources.title: Abundant Resources
resources.description: Access state-of-the-art computing resources, extensive datasets, and modern lab facilities.

growth.title: Career Growth
growth.description: Develop valuable skills in AI, healthcare, and research with excellent career advancement opportunities.

positions.title: Open Positions
positions.subtitle: Explore current opportunities to join our team and contribute to cutting-edge medical AI research.

ai.title: Postdoctoral Researcher in Medical AI and NLP
ai.description: We're seeking a postdoctoral researcher to work on cutting-edge medical AI projects, focusing on natural language processing of clinical text and medical large language models.

reqs.1: PhD in Computer Science, AI, NLP, or related field
reqs.2: Strong publication record in top-tier conferences/journals
reqs.3: Experience with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow)
reqs.4: Background in medical NLP or healthcare AI is preferred

responsibilities.1: Lead research projects on medical AI and NLP
responsibilities.3: Collaborate with medical professionals and interdisciplinary teams

medical.title: PhD Candidate in Medical AI
medical.description: Join our PhD program to conduct innovative research in medical artificial intelligence, working with real clinical data and hospital partnerships.

reqs.1: Master's degree in Computer Science, AI, or related field
reqs.2: Strong programming skills and mathematics background
reqs.3: Research experience in machine learning or AI

responsibilities.1: Conduct original research in medical AI
responsibilities.2: Publish research findings and present at conferences

engineering.title: Master's Student in AI Engineering
engineering.description: Looking for talented Master's students to work on the engineering aspects of medical AI systems, from data pipelines to model deployment.

reqs.1: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering
reqs.3: Interest in AI and healthcare applications

responsibilities.1: Develop and maintain medical AI systems
responsibilities.2: Work on data processing and model deployment

research.title: Research Intern in Medical AI
research.description: Exciting internship opportunity for students to gain hands-on experience in medical AI research and development.

reqs.1: Currently enrolled in undergraduate or graduate program
reqs.2: Programming experience and interest in AI/ML

responsibilities.1: Assist in research projects and data analysis
responsibilities.2: Contribute to AI model development and testing

apply.title: Submit Application
apply.description: Send your CV, research statement, and relevant documents to our email.

review.title: Application Review
review.description: Our team carefully reviews all applications and contacts promising candidates.

interview.title: Interview Process
interview.description: Selected candidates participate in technical and cultural fit interviews.

decision.title: Final Decision
decision.description: We make final decisions and extend offers to successful candidates.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions about joining our team? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.address: 5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District, Beijing, Peking University
